titles.title: Chemical and Biological Defense Program Improvement Act of 2023
Chemical and Biological Defense Program Improvement Act of 2023
To amend title 50, United States Code, to provide authority to include funding requests for the chemical and biological defense program in military budget accounts.

action.text: Referred to the House Committee on Armed Services.

bill.summary:
Chemical and Biological Defense Program Improvement Act of 2023
This bill allows the Department of Defense to include funding requests for the chemical and biological defense program within the budget accounts of the military departments.
